The room is filled with young students, approximately 14 in number, who appear to be around the ages of 6 to 8 years old. The students, dressed in varied casual attire such as sweaters, shirts, and pants, are standing up facing the front of the classroom.

The classroom is richly decorated with educational materials and displays. To the left of the image, there's a board displaying the alphabet, alongside various diagrams and pictures that seem to provide visual learning aids about different animals and objects. The central wall at the front of the classroom has several hanging educational posters, some featuring the United States map and others depicting historical themes. Notably, there's a prominent American flag hanging vertically beside these displays.

In the center and right of the classroom, more educational materials can be seen, including what looks like a bulletin board with more student artwork and creative projects. These works include what appear to be individual student portraits and possibly some thematic artwork related to seasons or other study topics.
